description:
Welcome to H&R Block, a leader in tax preparation services for over 60 years. We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Director of Data Science and Analytics to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will play a critical role in driving our data strategy and leveraging data insights to improve our business processes and drive growth. As a key member of our leadership team, you will have the opportunity to lead a team of data scientists and analysts and make a significant impact on our organization. If you have a passion for data and a proven track record of success in data science and analytics, we invite you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Develop and implement data strategies to improve business processes and drive growth.

Lead and manage a team of data scientists and analysts, providing guidance, support, and mentorship to ensure the team's success.

Develop and maintain relationships with internal stakeholders to understand their data needs and provide data-driven solutions.

Utilize advanced analytics techniques and tools to analyze large, complex datasets and provide actionable insights to key decision-makers.

Develop and maintain data governance policies and procedures to ensure data accuracy, security, and compliance.

Stay current with industry trends and advancements in data science and analytics to drive innovation and continuous improvement within the organization.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify areas where data analytics can be leveraged to improve business outcomes.

Present findings and recommendations to senior leadership in a clear and concise manner.

Ensure timely and accurate delivery of data and analytics projects, meeting all project deadlines and budget requirements.

Foster a culture of data-driven decision-making within the organization by promoting the use of data and analytics in all aspects of the business.

H&R Block is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
